Package meka.doc

Class AbstractOutputClassHierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • meka.doc.AbstractOutputClassHierarchy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OutputClassHierarchyMarkdown

    public abstract class AbstractOutputClassHierarchy
extends Object
implements Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler
    Ancestor for outputting documentation for class hierarchies in files.
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
